illustrations.title: Lego
illustrations.textDa: Jeg har lavet en legomand i Blender.
illustrations.textEng: I have created a lego figurine, with different moods, using Blender.

illustrations.title: 3D City
illustrations.textDa: Jeg har lavet en 3D by i Illustrator, efter at have tegnet med blyant på isometrisk papir
illustrations.textEng: I have made a 3D city using Illustrator, after drawing with pencil on isometric paper.

illustrations.title: Fork
illustrations.textDa: Jeg har lavet en gaffel i programmet Maya, vi skulle lave formen, lyset og underpladen.
illustrations.textEng: I have made a fork in Maya, we had to make the shape, lighting and the plate.

illustrations.title: B0bles
illustrations.textDa: Jeg har lavet nogle møbler i blender, de skulle have 2 farver skema.
illustrations.textEng: I have created some furniture using blender, they have 2 color schemes.
